### Sum of Reads

```{r NumReads}
n_Reads <- format(sum(as.numeric(collect(filter(db, Attribute == "Number of Reads") %>% select(Value))$Value)), big.mark=",",scientific=F)
sprintf("Number of Reads Sequenced: %s", n_Reads)
```
